mapper.select: select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where u_id=#{u_id} and v_state = 1;
select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state=1 group by v_code ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 16;
select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state=1 and v_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{v_name},'%');
mapper.insert:
select (select max(CAST(substring(v_code,4) as integer)) from ssf_schema.video_upload)+1;
insert into ssf_schema.video_upload (v_code, v_name, v_img, c_code, u_id, v_link, v_descript) values (concat ('avi', #{v_code}), #{v_name}, #{v_img}, #{c_code}, #{u_id}, #{v_link}, #{v_descript})
mapper.select: select a.v_code,a.v_name,a.c_code,a.v_descript,b.c_name from ssf_schema.video_upload as a left join ssf_schema.category as b on a.c_code = b.c_code where a.v_code =#{v_code};
mapper.update: update ssf_schema.video_upload set v_name = #{v_name},c_code = #{c_code},v_descript =#{v_descript} where v_code = #{v_code};
mapper.select: select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state=1 ORDER BY v_views DESC LIMIT 4;
mapper.update: update ssf_schema.video_upload set v_views = v_views + 1 where v_code = #{v_code};
mapper.select: select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state = 1 and v_name like CONCAT('%',#{v_name},'%') or v_descript like CONCAT('%',#{v_name},'%') order by v_date desc limit 5 offset #{pageNum}*5;
